oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pennsylvania Avenue Church of Christ, 2001 May
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of Pennsylvania Avenue Church of Christ located at 5411 Pennsylvania Avenue in Nashville, Tennessee. The foundation is made of brick in the front and concrete block in the rear. The exterior walls are made of brick that has been painted white. The roof is gabled and hipped and composed of tar shingles. A flat roof covers a rear section of the building. The windows contain yellow and white panes of colored glass. Clear glass with wire coverings make up the panes in the basement windows. Front doors are wood with a transom window above them. Two brick columns adorn the entryway. This address is no longer listed in the Nashville City Directory. Forms part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. Sacred Sites Survey Project. 1 photograph : col. ; 4 x 6 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Pennsylvania Avenue Church of Christ (Nashville, Tenn.)
